# GitHub Agents Directory

This directory is reserved for GitHub Copilot agent configurations and custom automation scripts.

## Purpose

GitHub agents can be configured here to provide specialized assistance for:
- Code reviews
- Testing automation
- Documentation generation
- Security scanning
- Deployment automation

## Usage

Add agent configuration files in YAML format to enable custom behaviors and automations specific to this repository.

## Example Structure

```
.github/agents/
├── code-review.yml
├── testing.yml
└── deployment.yml
```

For more information, refer to GitHub's agent documentation.
